name: Compass Black FREE
description: Fast and stable Compass in a beautiful Style. Simply shows you the north. It uses accurate values for the degrees.   The following functions you can activate or deactivate:  - Needle changes to green when youre close to north - degrees on the Circle - stabilizer - Fast red Indicator  - Speed and perfomance can be changed  strong magnetical fields can change the results. The FULL Version is without any Banner.
